A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 21:58 UTC<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:58:19 <Notch> vede: Now?}}</ref>. This version attempted to fix a focus bug, but this was unsuccessful. This version therefore has no changes at all.

== Fixes ==
* Attempted to fix focus bug with mouse and keyboard when fullscreen mode switching on Linux, but this was unsuccessful.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"16:59:33 <Peerko> not working for me"..."16:59:53 <vede> :( Nope, still have the mouse focus problem."}}</ref>
